languages.text: {n}Издав грозную бинарную трель, Паскаль мрачно возвещает:{/n} "С благословения Омниссии Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус явил{mf|ся|ась} к Чудотворному Реактору Синтеза для свершения очищения и искоренения порчи. Всем не авторизованным личностям надлежит сложить оружие и смиренно принять свое наказание".

{n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binharic trill and announces grimly,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."
languages.original_text: {n}Издав грозную бинарную трель, Паскаль мрачно возвещает:{/n} "С благословения Омниссии Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус явил{mf|ся|ась} к Чудотворному Реактору Синтеза для свершения очищения и искоренения порчи. Всем не авторизованным личностям надлежит сложить оружие и смиренно принять свое наказание".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binary trill and announces gloomily,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal stößt einen binhärischen Triller aus und verkündet ernst:{/n} "Mit dem Segen des Omnissiah ist {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Valancius vor den Wundersamen Fusionsreaktor getreten, um eine Läuterung durchzuführen und die Korruption zu tilgen. Allen unbefugten Personen wird hiermit befohlen, ihre Waffen niederzulegen und demütig ihre Strafe zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binharic trill and announces grimly,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal stößt einen furchterregenden binären Triller aus und verkündet düster:{/n} "Mit dem Segen des Omnissiah ist {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} von Valancius vor den Wundersamen Fusionsreaktor getreten, um eine Läuterung durchzuführen und die Korruption zu tilgen. Allen unbefugten Personen wird hiermit befohlen, ihre Waffen niederzulegen und demütig ihre Strafe zu akzeptieren."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal pousse un trille binhaire d'intimidation et annonce d'un ton sinistre :{/n} « Avec la bénédiction de l'Omnimessie, {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} von Valancius se présente devant le réacteur à fusion miraculeux afin d'effectuer un acte de purification en éradiquant toute corruption. Toute personne non autorisée est sommée de déposer les armes et d'accepter humblement son châtiment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binharic trill and announces grimly,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal pousse un trille binhaire d'intimidation et annonce d'un ton sinistre :{/n} « Avec la bénédiction de l'Omnimessie, {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} von Valancius se présente devant le réacteur à fusion miraculeux afin d'effectuer un acte de purification en éradiquant toute corruption. Toute personne non autorisée est sommée de déposer les armes et d'accepter humblement son châtiment. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡发出一串充满恐吓意味的二进制颤音，阴沉地宣告道。{/n}“在欧姆尼塞亚的庇佑下，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人驾临神赐聚变反应堆，以净化污秽，根除腐化。特此敕令，所有未经授权之人放下武器，谦卑地乞求责罚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binharic trill and announces grimly,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡发出一串充满恐吓意味的二进制颤音，阴沉地宣告。{/n}“在欧姆尼塞亚的庇佑下，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人驾临神赐聚变反应堆，以净化污秽，根除腐化。特此敕令，所有未经授权之人放下武器，谦卑地乞求责罚。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは、威圧するように2進法でキュルキュルと音を立て、不機嫌に告げる。{/n}「万機神の祝福を受けて、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが奇跡のフュージョンリアクターの前へ姿を現し、浄化を実行して腐敗を根絶しに来た。これにより、権限のない者は武器をすべて捨て、罰を大人しく受け入れることを命じる」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binharic trill and announces grimly,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは、威圧するように2進法でキュルキュルと音を立て、暗い表情で告げる。{/n}「万機神の祝福を受けて、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスが奇跡のフュージョンリアクターの前へ姿を現し、浄化を実行して腐敗を根絶しに来た。これにより、権限のない者は武器をすべて捨て、罰を大人しく受け入れることを命じる」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal deja escapar un intimidante sonido binario y anuncia sombríamente,{/n} «Con la bendición del Omnissiah, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius se ha presentado ante el Reactor de Fusión Milagroso, buscando realizar una purificación y erradicar la corrupción. Se ordena a todas las personas no autorizadas que depongan las armas y acepten humildemente su castigo».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binharic trill and announces grimly,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal deja escapar un intimidante sonido binario y anuncia sombríamente,{/n} «Con la bendición del Omnissiah, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius se ha presentado ante el Reactor de Fusión Milagroso, buscando realizar una purificación y erradicar la corrupción. Se ordena a todas las personas no autorizadas que depongan las armas y acepten humildemente su castigo».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, ikili dilde tehditkâr bir ses çıkarıp haşince konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir von Valancius, Hermesih'in lütfuyla Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'nün huzuruna teşrif etmiştir. Hür Tacir, arınmayı gerçekleştirerek yozluğu ortadan kaldıracaktır. Yetkisiz tüm şahısların, silahlarını bırakmak suretiyle teslim olup cezalarına boyun eğmeleri emredilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lets out an intimidating binharic trill and announces grimly,{/n} "With the Omnissiah's blessing, the Rogue Trader von Valancius has come before the Miraculous Fusion Reactor, seeking to perform purification and eradicate the corruption. All unauthorised persons are hereby ordered to lay down their arms and humbly accept their punishment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, ikili dilde tehditkâr bir ses çıkarıp haşince konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir von Valancius, Hermesih'in lütfuyla Mucizevi Füzyon Reaktörü'nün huzuruna teşrif etmiştir. Hür Tacir, arınmayı gerçekleştirerek yozluğu ortadan kaldıracaktır. Yetkisiz tüm şahısların, silahlarını bırakmak suretiyle teslim olup cezalarına boyun eğmeleri emredilir."
